    • Method Detail

      • getOnlineNinPlayers

        @NotNull
List<NinPlayer> getOnlineNinPlayers()
        Get all online NinPlayers. Returns an empty list if there ar eno online NinPlayers.
        Returns:
        All online NinPlayers, will return an empty list if there are no online NinPlayers.

      • getNinPlayer

        @Nullable
NinPlayer getNinPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
        Get a online NinPlayer by Player.
        Parameters:
        p - The related Player
        Returns:
        The NinPlayer which was found, will return null if no NinPlayer was found.

      • getServer

        @NotNull
org.bukkit.Server getServer()
        Get the Server.
        Returns:
        The Server.

      • dispatchCommand

        void dispatchCommand(String command)
        Dispatch a command from console. A pre command slash should NOT be included.
        Parameters:
        command - The command string to send.

      • getEntityById

        @Nullable
org.bukkit.entity.Entity getEntityById(int id)
        Get an entity by it's entity ID. Searches in all worlds.
        Parameters:
        id - The entity ID to search the related entity for.
        Returns:
        The entity, if no entity was found, null will be returned.

        org.bukkit.World getDefaultWorld()
